ValidationRule.description: Score must be a whole number from 0-10
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3"), Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=0, Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=1, Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=2, Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=3, Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=4, Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=5, Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=6, Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=7, Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=8, Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=9, Owner_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=10 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Scores must be a whole number between 0 and 10.
